entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
